subTitle: Principal, Greenfield High School
title: Samantha Lee
desc: Implementing this School ERP has completely transformed our administration. Attendance, exams, and communication with parents are now seamless and efficient.

subTitle: Head of Academics, Sunrise Academy
title: David Johnson
desc: The ERP system is user-friendly and powerful. Teachers can manage classes and grades easily, and students benefit from better organized academic schedules.

subTitle: Administrator, Maple Leaf School
title: Priya Nair
desc: Our communication with parents has improved significantly. The platform is reliable, secure, and has made daily school management much more efficient.
